item.title: [Python] Implement JWT login function in Django REST framework
item.description: # Previous article Django REST framework + Vue.js “Let’s make SEIYU-like EC site” 6 times (plan) Let’s create a SEIYU-like EC site (1) Requirements analysis and project initialization Let’s create a SEIYU-like EC site (2) Renew the management screen using Xadmin Let’s make an SEIYU-like EC site (3) Let’s make an explosion API with Django REST framework Create a SEIYU-like EC site (4) Use Vue.js project initialization TypeScript Even if you do not see the contents so far, you can understand the contents of this time, so I hope that you can have a relationship until the end.
